name: Bosch Eternal
description:
Interactive

A nonprofit interactive art gallery dedicated to the great master of horror, Hieronymus Bosch.

Atmospheric

Each painting has a description and its own atmospheric sounds. Delve into the artists’ works while learning something new!

Confirmed Artwork

The project features most of the surviving artist’s paintings and confirmed drawings, and some of his followers’ artwork as well.

Truly immersive

Master Bosch’s canvases brought to life in the authentic ‘s-Hertogenbosch of the year 1550—34 years later after the artist’s death

Co-op mode

You don’t have to do it all alone. Grab your friends and enjoy the stunning arts together! Both text and voice chat are at your disposal!

Download now and try new immersive gallery simulation!

Official web-page             Join us on Twitter
